title: Hybrid Daydream
description: Une esthétique surréaliste mêlant médias mixtes qui superpose harmonieusement des illustrations vectorielles plates et ombrées (cel-shading) dans des environnements photographiques hyperréalistes. Le style se définit par le contraste saisissant entre l'art 2D aux contours nets et le monde texturé haute fidélité qu'il habite, ancré physiquement par des interactions réalistes telles que les reflets dans l'eau et les ombres portées directionnelles.
description_en: A surreal mixed-media aesthetic that seamlessly superimposes flat, cel-shaded vector illustrations into hyper-realistic photographic environments. The style is defined by the striking contrast between the clean, outlined 2D character art and the textured, high-fidelity world they inhabit, grounded physically by realistic interactions such as water reflections and directional cast shadows.
description_fr: Une esthétique surréaliste mêlant médias mixtes qui superpose harmonieusement des illustrations vectorielles plates et ombrées (cel-shading) dans des environnements photographiques hyperréalistes. Le style se définit par le contraste saisissant entre l'art 2D aux contours nets et le monde texturé haute fidélité qu'il habite, ancré physiquement par des interactions réalistes telles que les reflets dans l'eau et les ombres portées directionnelles.
prompt:
A seamless mixed-media composition merging hyper-realistic photography with flat 2D vector illustration, featuring {{subject}} as the central focus. The image must occupy the absolute ENTIRE dedicated space, FULL BLEED to all four corners, with NO borders, NO frames, NO white margins, and NO canvas edges. The {{subject}} is rendered in a distinct 'anime-influenced' vector style: clean, uniform black outlines, solid flat color fills in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, and simplified hard-edged cel-shading. This 2D illustration is composited into a vibrant, high-resolution photograph of a real-world environment. The photographic background is textured, detailed, and rich with natural imperfections, contrasting sharply with the smooth, digital perfection of the {{subject}}. 

The lighting setup is crucial to the illusion: the photographic environment is bathed in bright, natural daylight (simulating a sunny noon) with high-contrast shadows. The flat {{subject}} reacts to this lighting with simplified highlight patches but casts a complex, realistic shadow onto the photographic ground. Crucially, if water or a glossy surface is present, the 2D {{subject}} casts a physically accurate, rippled, and distorted reflection that mimics the properties of the realistic liquid, blending the {{secondary_color}} of the environment with the flat colors of the character. The color palette juxtaposes the saturated, artificial hues of the vector art against the organic, atmospheric tones of the real world. The composition creates a playful sense of scale and presence, treating the illustrated figure as a tangible object within a photorealistic space. The atmosphere is whimsical, sunny, and slightly surreal, blurring the line between animation and reality.
prompt_removebg:
A seamless mixed-media composition merging hyper-realistic photography with flat 2D vector illustration, featuring {{subject}} as the central focus. The {{subject}} is rendered in a distinct 'anime-influenced' vector style: clean, uniform black outlines, solid flat color fills in {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}, and simplified hard-edged cel-shading. Instead of a complex environment, the subject is composited on a clean {{background_color}} surface. The lighting setup remains consistent with a bright, sunny environment: the flat {{subject}} features simplified highlight patches and casts a distinct, realistic contact shadow onto the {{background_color}} floor to ground it in space. 

The edges of the {{subject}} are crisp and vector-sharp, contrasting with the soft, diffused quality of the shadow. The {{subject}}'s reflection is subtly visible on the {{background_color}} surface, rendered as a slightly distorted, semi-transparent mirror image that fades into the background, maintaining the illusion of a 2D object sitting on a 3D plane. The color palette highlights the {{primary_color}} of the subject against the neutral or contrasting {{background_color}}, ensuring the vector art pops with artificial vibrancy while maintaining physical grounding through shadow and reflection physics.
background_prompt: A hyper-realistic, high-resolution photograph of a scenic outdoor environment, serving as a backdrop for a mixed-media composition. The scene features absolutely NO foreground subjects, NO characters, and NO illustrations. It is a pure, detailed photographic plate capturing a bright, sunny day with hard, distinct shadows indicating a high sun. The environment is rich in texture—concrete, foliage, or water—rendered with photorealistic precision and zero grain. The color grading is vibrant and natural, emphasizing {{secondary_color}} tones in the sky or landscape and {{accent_color}} details in the architecture or flora. The lighting is global and uniform, providing a clean stage with realistic depth cues, atmospheric perspective, and reflective surfaces (like a river, puddle, or polished floor) ready to receive a superimposed element.
background_prompt_removebg: A hyper-realistic, high-resolution photograph of a scenic outdoor environment, serving as a backdrop. The scene features a bright, sunny day with hard shadows and rich textures like concrete, foliage, or water, emphasizing {{secondary_color}} and {{accent_color}} tones. In the immediate foreground, a flat, vector-art decorative frame or 'window' overlay is added, drawn in the same style as a 2D cartoon with clean black outlines and {{primary_color}} fills. This 2D frame creates a border through which the realistic photo is viewed. The entire composition—the vector frame and the photo within it—floats against a flat {{background_color}} backdrop. The edges of the vector frame cast a soft, realistic drop shadow onto the {{background_color}} surface, creating a distinct separation between the mixed-media artwork and the solid background color.
